snippet: Six members of one of the world's most secretive sororities - the office of the White House social secretary - regaled an audience in Washington Tuesday night with stories about President Obama, Queen Elizabeth and White House guests.
abstract: Six members of one of the world's most secretive sororities - the office of the White House social secretary - regaled an audience in Washington Tuesday night with stories about President Obama, Queen Elizabeth and White House guests.

headline.main: Social Secretaries Dish on White House Dinners and More
